A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This is a good film. It suffers from some of the prequels flaws in poor comedic timing\, and it is clear that some plot points were cut (or not cut) that could have made the movie flawless. 

That said\, it contains some excellent moments and is a worthy addition to the Star Wars universe. 

It is an excellent "middle" film in that it truly starts the process of bridging gap between the old and the new.
